title: Les Enchevêtrés
provenance_text:
Wols (Alfred Otto Wolfgang Schulze) [1913-1951], Paris, France; Gimpel Fils Ltd, London, in September 1963 [1]; purchased by Mr. and Mrs. Edward Haskell [1920-1988], Pittsburgh, PA, on September 26, 1963 until June 23, 1988 [2]; Jane (Mrs. Edward) Haskell [1923-2013], June 23, 1988 until May 28, 2013 until May 28, 2013; partial gift to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1993, December 2005, and remainder bequest in September 2013.

Notes:
[1]. The work may have been on consignment with Gimpel FIls; see entry for "Dans Le Vent", 93.186.4.
[2]. See invoice from Gimpel Fils for $1,800 in curatorial file.

creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
